content: In alchemy, what legendary substance was believed to turn base metals into silver or gold, often referred to as the "universal elixir"?

Ah, you're delving into the mystical realm of alchemy! The legendary substance you're referring to is called the Philosopher's Stone. It was believed to possess the power not only to transmute base metals into silver or gold but also to grant eternal life and serve as a universal elixir. Alchemists spent centuries seeking the secrets to create this enigmatic stone, blending elements of science, philosophy, and spirituality in their pursuits.
